projects.title: RFLCT
projects.description: RFLCT is a voice activated smart mirror that uses facial recognition to recognize a user and display helpful information in a beautiful inteface.

projects.title: Eliza
projects.description: Eliza is a Facebook Messenger chatbot built for Hack Against Violence, a weekend hackathon that sought ways to diffuse violence and promote social inclusion across the globe.

projects.title: Accomplishe
projects.description: Third place winner at Lady Problems Hackathon in San Francisco! ACCOMPLISHE is a web app that helps women track their moments of success, power, and growth in the workplace so that they have a clear sense of what they bring to the table and feel more confident advocating for themselves.

projects.title: Github Battle Arena
projects.description: It's a web app built with React that fetches public data from two players' Github accounts, compares their key statistics, and returns a winner!

projects.title: Viddy
projects.description: A movie poster and trailer site built in React with Redux for state management.

projects.title: Caprese
projects.description: A pomodoro timer built in React with a Rails backend for time and productivity management.

projects.title: Kelvn
projects.description: A fun web app built in Sinatra for sending annoying text messages to your friends and enemies.
